extendedIngredients.name: chocolate chips
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 oz Enjoy Life chocolate chips (or dark chocolate chips

extendedIngredients.name: red wine
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup red wine (I used a red blend)

recipes.title: Red Wine Chocolate Truffles
recipes.instructions: Place chocolate chips in a small bowl.Bring wine to a low boil over medium heat.Pour wine over chocolate chips and stir until completely melted.Stir in butter.Allow mixture to sit until it becomes firm enough to roll into balls, stirring every 5-10 minutes (this takes a total of about an hour).Set aside cocoa powder in a small bowl.Once chocolate is firm, roll into small balls.Toss each truffle into cocoa powder to coat, then place in a colander to shake off excess cocoa.ENJOY!**Store in refrigerator to keep longer
